html: Keep your food safe during a power outage to avoid foodborne illness. Key tips to remember 1. Keep fridge & freezer doors closed. 2. Food in fridge is safe for up to 4 hours. 3. Food in freezer is safe for up to 48 hours (if full). #Florence #HurricaneFlorencepic.twitter.com/PKj7b9Ode9
text:
Keep your food safe during a power outage to avoid foodborne illness. Key tips to remember  
1. Keep fridge & freezer doors closed. 
2. Food in fridge is safe for up to 4 hours. 
3. Food in freezer is safe for up to 48 hours (if full). 
#Florence #HurricaneFlorencepic.twitter.com/PKj7b9Ode9
